media:group.media:title: Virtual Museum Experience
media:group.media:description:
GitHub code: https://github.com/doktorfrag/art-exhibition-vr
About me: https://doktorfrag.wordpress.com
VRTK: https://vrtoolkit.readme.io
Unity: https://unity3d.com
Background music: http://www.flashkit.com/loops/Ambient/Measures-AlaShook-10433/index.php

The physical layout of a museum gallery and the manner in which artwork is installed influence how visitors interpret an exhibition. The Virtual Museum Experience is a prototype virtual reality application that allows users to experiment with the physical layout of a museum space and the relationship of exhibition objects to each other. By changing the structure of an exhibition, users assume a more active role in constructing meaning and understanding the effects of layouts on spatial narratives and space-use patterns.
